info.title: VZaar API
info.description: vzaar is an online video hosting service with fantastic features that are designed for business. Deliver to mobile or the web straight from your site.

get.description: nnThis API call returns the details and rights for each vzaar subscription account type along with its relevant metadata. This will show the details of the packages available here: http://vzaar.com/pricingnn

parameters.name: account is the vzaar account type. This is an integer.

post.description: nnThis API call allows a user to upload & process video file from given url.nn

parameters.name: bitrate
parameters.description: Specifies videos bitrate

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specifies the description for the video

parameters.name: encoding_params
parameters.description: Includes optional parameters

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: Specifies the guid to operate on

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: A name for the S3 object that stores the uploaded file

parameters.name: size_id
parameters.description: Specifies the size for the video to be encoded in

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Specifies the title for the video

parameters.name: transcoding
parameters.description: True forces vzaar to transcode the video, false makes vzaar use the original source file

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Specifies the url to video file

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Specifies videos width

get.description: nnThis API call returns the users public details along with its relevant metadata.nn

parameters.name: username is the vzaar login name for the user. Note: This must be the actual username and not the email address

post.description: nnThis API call tells the vzaar system to process a newly uploaded video. This will encode it if necessary and then provide a vzaar video idea back.nn

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specifies the description for the video

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: Specifies the guid to operate on

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Comma separated list of labels to be assigned to the video

parameters.name: profile
parameters.description: Specifies the size for the video to be encoded in. If not specified, this will use the vzaar default or the user default (if set)

parameters.name: replace_id
parameters.description: Specifies the video ID of an existing video that you wish to replace with the new video.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Specifies the title for the video

parameters.name: transcoding
parameters.description: True forces vzaar to transcode the video, false makes vzaar use the original source file (available only for mp4 and flv files)

get.description: nnThis API call allows a user to request a GUID and an AWS S3 signature. With these credentials the user will then be able upload a file into vzaar video storage area.nnThe response for this must be parsed and used in the Upload step. The upload will fail if any of these details are incorrect.nn

parameters.name: flash_request
parameters.description: Allows you to use a flash uploader

parameters.name: max_file_size
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum file size (in bytes) to limit the upload too. This gets written into the policy document

parameters.name: success_action_redirect
parameters.description: Specifies if to redirect to a URL after a successful post instead of issuing a 201. See the upload documentation for more details on this.

get.description: nnvzaar uses the oEmbed open standard for allowing 3rd parties to integrated with the vzaar. You can use the vzaar video URL to easily obtain the appropriate embed code for that video. To find out more about oEmbed view the specification here: http://oembed.com/nn

parameters.name: borderless,
parameters.description: If set to true and the user has sufficient privileges, the size and embeded code returned will be be for a borderless player. Else ignored

parameters.name: embed_only,
parameters.description: When returning data, only include the minimum fields and embed code possible. Use this if you want the quickest and smallest return code for embedding in it

parameters.name: videos is the vzaar video number for that video.

post.description: nnThis API call allows a user to save a file to vzaars storage space on AWS S3, so that it can then be processed.nnThe arguments used to submit the upload HTTP POST must be obtained from the sign call.nnThe sign call includes an expiration time. It is suggest the upload is done immediately after requesting the arguments to keep within this expiration window.nn

parameters.name: acl
parameters.description: The access control policy to apply to the uploaded file

parameters.name: AWSAccessKeyId
parameters.description: The vzaar AWS Access Key Identifier credential

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: The vzaar bucket that has been allocated for this file

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: type string

parameters.name: Filename
parameters.description: The name of the file passed through from the flash. Flash does this automatically.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: A name for the S3 object that will store the uploaded files data

parameters.name: policy
parameters.description: A Base64

parameters.name: signature
parameters.description: A signature value that authorizes the form and proves that only vzaar could have created it. This value is calculated by signing the policy document

parameters.name: success_action_redirect
parameters.description: Specifies if to redirect to a URL after a successful post instead of issuing a 201. If set this must be the same as specified in the sign call

parameters.name: success_action_status
parameters.description: The status code returned to the client upon successful upload if success_action_redirect is not specified. This must be set to 201 to match the policy document we create

get.description: nnThis API call returns a list of the users active videos along with its relevant metadata. 20 videos are returned by default but this is customisable.nn

parameters.name: count,
parameters.description: Specifies the number of videos to retrieve per page. Default is 20. Maximum is 100

parameters.name: page,
parameters.description: Specifies the page number to retrieve. Default is 1

parameters.name: sort,
parameters.description: Values can be asc (least_recent) or desc (most_recent). Defaults to desc

parameters.name: status,
parameters.description: Values can be processing, active, replaced, deleted and failed

parameters.name: title,
parameters.description: Return only videos with title containing given string

parameters.name: username is the vzaar login name for the user. Note: This must be the actual username and not the email address
description
parameters.description: Specifies the new description for the video

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: Specifies to use the HTTP PUT method if submitting the call via HTTP POST

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: Marks the video as private or public

parameters.name: seo_url
parameters.description: Specifies the SEO url for the video

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Specifies the new title for the video

parameters.name: videos is the vzaar video number for that video.
method
parameters.description: Specifies to use the HTTP DELETE method if submitting the call via HTTP POST

parameters.name: videos is the vzaar video number for that video.
thumb_time
parameters.description: Specifies time for the frame
